category.name: Manufacturing

preference.name: MEGANTTImplicitFlowColor
preference.preference_description: Defines the RGB (Red, Green, Blue) code for the color of implicit flows in Gantt charts in the Manufacturing Process Planner application. Valid values is a triplet of integer values from 0 to 255 separated by the ";" character.
